code: SELECT FirstName, LastName, Age FROM Customers;
SELECT City, Country FROM Customers WHERE Country = 'USA';
SELECT * FROM Orders WHERE OrderDate BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-12-31';
SELECT CategoryName, COUNT(*) as TotalProducts FROM Products GROUP BY CategoryName;
SELECT AVG(Price) as AveragePrice FROM Products;
SELECT SupplierName, COUNT(*) as TotalProducts FROM Products GROUP BY SupplierName HAVING COUNT(*) > 5;
SELECT FirstName, LastName FROM Employees WHERE Salary > 50000 ORDER BY LastName ASC;
SELECT ProductName, Price FROM Products WHERE Price > 50 AND Price < 100;
SELECT * FROM Orders ORDER BY OrderDate DESC LIMIT 10;
SELECT CategoryName FROM Categories WHERE CategoryName LIKE 'F%';
